;&bull In line with this, several men and women believe that there is in some way a correlation among the present United States president and the occurrence of the cataclysm involving Nibiru in accordance to the prognostications by Nostradamus. The said 16th century French astrologer is deemed to be 1 of individuals individuals who have considerably an correct foretelling prowess that is in by itself actual and reputable. In his predictions, he pointed out about the existence of a character named "Mabus", who will signify the onset of chaos on the earth.
;
;&bull In this facet, "Mabus" is explained to be a mix of the names "Obama" and "Bush", the two newest presidents of one particular of the most powerful countries in the globe. When the present president was elected, it produced a relatively wretched reaction from particular groups of individuals towards the predictions of Nostradamus, who have formerly mentioned about a "darkish gentleman originating from slaves" taking control. This coincidence may possibly or may not be true, but there is even now minor or no proof with regards to this matter at all. As these kinds of, Nibiru 2012 Planet X Barack Obama Evolution is however to be verified.

;&bull Contrary to this, other individuals say that the stated character is in fact an true gentleman, in the man or woman of a certain Ray Mabus, who performs as an adviser to the president in terms of the dealings of the US in the Center East. It is mentioned that in case an assassination of this gentleman is manufactured, it would mark the begin of a cataclysmic stage on earth, perhaps the start of Globe War III. Shockingly, Nostradamus' predictions mentioned one thing about "vengeance" that could be connected to this event, and the existence of "a comet" that is thought to be a literary representation for a nuclear bomb hitting the terrorists who would assassinate the president's adviser.
;
;&bull Others say that the presence of "Mabus" is the birth of the greatest antichrist, the features of whom is considerably in line with that of Adolf Hitler and Napoleon Bonaparte. The activities that he could trigger would be relatively devastating, and Nibiru 2012 Planet X Barack Obama Evolution might be right associated to this. How could a planet from a distant location could orbit so quick in a span of 6 many years? They in no way presented any facts at all, just illustrations of the passage of the planet.

;Rumors spread that on Might fifteen, 2009 Planet Nibiru would be visible around the southern hemisphere. But nothing occurred nor something odd in the skies.
;
;If our planet's magnetic poles are aligning in the direction of Nibiru then what about the other planets? What about Jupiter? Saturn? The Sun? ;Planet Nibiru is due to pass amongst the Earth and the Sun in this timeframe triggering a gravitation pull which will quit the Earth's rotation resulting in a 90 degree positional shift or a polar shift. This in flip will make a shock wave of radiation from pole to pole.
;
;The construct-up to the coming of Nibiru can be witnessed in the anomalies that the Earth is previously experiencing through Tsunamis, hurricanes, earthquakes of incredible scale and proportion. ;
;All satellites, conversation links, Tv, radio, web, GPS positioning are all due to fall short by way of the oncoming arrival of Planet X.
